articles.description: B.C., Saskatchewan and Ontario are lifting some coronavirus restrictions today, but customers and workers are in for a different experience as businesses reopen under new public health guidelines. Read on for a look at what's happening across Canada.

articles.content:
The latest:
Schools in Ontario won't be reopening this academic year because of the ongoing threat from the COVID-19 pandemic, Premier Doug Ford announced Tuesday.
